# Welcome!

-   The goal of the 8-days course is to introduce kep concepts in statistics with medical applications.
-   The course is intended for students and researchers who are interested in statistics and R programming (e.g. biomedical data)
-   Course material can be found in the course [github repository](https://github.com/ocbe-uio/teaching_mf9130e).
